msg.content: This I like to know too. At least, Amethyst is fast, even with a bad internet connection.
I am not so into Bitcoin, but I like to know if this conversation is encrypted, how save it is etc.
Hello guys, I'm new here and eager to learn, what this is all about...
Hi all, I dont seem to be getting the "notification dot" on my home tab icon on here, anyone know if there is anything I can do? Tried restarting amethyst etc

So it's used to validate a user with their NIP-05 domain.
Any fake Cyborg can copy-paste NIP-05 as cyborg@snort.social but the returned npub will not match fake Cyborg's npub

For example, Cyborg bot has NIP-05 cyborg@snort.social.
So when Amethyst queries snort.social for npub associated with name "cyborg" & returned value matches Cyborg's npub seen by Amethyst, then there's a s ✔️ else ❗

https://bible.com/pt/bible/211/pro.22.6.NTLH

That their NIP-05 is not valid. The client tried to verify if the user's npub matches with the npub associated with the user name at their NIP-05 domain.
If it doesn't match or is unavailable, then ❗is shown

Segue o passo a passo de como ativar o ⚡

1- Baixe a carteira https://www.walletofsatoshi.com/
2- Na Wallet of Satoshi, clique no botão receber e copie o "email" que está abaixo do código Qr.
3- Abra seu cliente Nostr e edite seu perfil adicionando esse email no campo Endereço LN, ou algo assim.

Pronto, vc estará com o raio ativado no Nostr e as pessoas poderão te enviar bitcoins pelas suas postagens.

Fácil né?

You will need a few things though. You need a lightning wallet, like Wallet of Satoshi and a lightning URL where the money can be sent to. (Kinda like an email address for receiving payments)
A zap is a small bitcoinpayment sent over the lightning network through nostr. Think of it like tipping a super small amount of money.

msg.content: (I'm sending from amethyst, which shows the/an image)
You see here that I got a batch indicating a verified account
Atm, the so called tld or namespace 'nostr' is not supported in XT wallet, Signum mobile or Phoenix.
In the near future you'll also be able to use the alias (your claimed name) as recipient name in signum wallets. E.g. in my case ohager:nostr ...
Somewhere under profile settings you can enter a NIP05 idenfier
Like in coracle.social and or amethyst
The name can be used in nostr clients under the key word NIP05 verification
You haven't purchased, but claimed. It's a gift 😀
